description: This file sets up API route handlers for a game backend server, providing API documentation, WebSocket stats, and mounting other route modules.

methods.name: Router.get (/)
methods.description: Handles GET request to the root API endpoint, returning API documentation and endpoint info.

methods.name: Router.get (/ws/stats)
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve WebSocket connection statistics.

methods.name: Router.use
methods.description: Mounts sub-route modules for specific API functionalities.
